data.title: The Apricity Forum: A European Cultural Community
meta_keywords: we're safe here dralos doesn't watch films....
data.meta_description:
We need this thread. A couple I have seen recently : 
 
Terminator 4 - 6/10 Disappointing. Christian Bale was good in American Psycho, he doesn't ruin this film either, it's rather the film that ruins him. 
 
The Hangover - 9/10 Thumbs up. Those four characters who wake up after a night of drunken stupor have obviously a hard time remembering what did they do. And then a movie is out of this. You HAVE to watch it, especially for the Mike Tyson part when he drums "in the air tonight", from Phil
data.text:
View Full Version : What is the last movie you watched ?
